org.apache.lenya.cms.ac
Class ItemManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.lenya.cms.ac.ItemManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroupManager, IPRangeManager, RoleManager, UserManager
public abstract class ItemManager
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract superclass for classes that manage items loaded from configuration files.

Author:
egli, Andreas Hartmann
